product_overview: The Brotherhood Barbershop website is a modern and responsive platform designed to provide barbershop customers with an intuitive and seamless online experience. It enables users to explore service offerings, browse a curated gallery, read customer reviews, and conveniently book appointments via WhatsApp integration.
core_goals: Increase appointment bookings by simplifying the booking process
Showcase all barbershop services with detailed pricing and descriptions
Build customer trust through displaying testimonials and social proof
Provide comprehensive business information including location, hours, and contact details
Deliver a polished, accessible, and mobile-friendly interface to enhance user experience
key_features: Fixed responsive header with smooth scroll navigation and mobile menu toggle
Eye-catching full-screen hero section with animated statistics and call-to-action buttons
About section featuring animated story and values cards with hover effects
Service categories displayed as cards opening modals detailing services with pricing and booking links
Dynamic responsive image gallery integrated with Instagram, featuring lazy loading and hover overlays
Responsive reviews carousel showcasing 57 testimonials with auto-rotation and manual navigation
Interactive booking form with date/time validation, service selection, WhatsApp pre-filled message integration, and form validation
Contact section with business information, clickable phone/email links, and embedded responsive Google Map
FAQ accordion for common questions with smooth animations and accessible keyboard navigation
Footer providing site links, legal modals (privacy policy, terms), social media links, and business hours
Cookie consent banner for GDPR compliance with toggleable cookie categories and localStorage persistence
Technical optimizations including code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, caching, and accessibility enhancements
user_flow_summary: Primary flow: User navigates homepage, clicks or scrolls to booking section, completes validated booking form, which opens WhatsApp pre-filled message for appointment scheduling, then submits and resets form.
Secondary flow: User explores service categories by clicking on cards, views detailed service listings and prices in modal, then navigates to booking section via modal’s 'Book Service' button.
Tertiary flow: User browses gallery images loaded via API, hovers to reveal Instagram icon overlay, and clicks images to open Instagram in new tab.

Information seeking flow: User navigates through about, services, gallery, reviews, FAQ, and contact sections, accessing detailed business info and contacting via provided phone, email, or WhatsApp links.
validation_criteria: Navigation links produce smooth scrolling and mobile menu toggles function correctly
Hero section displays fully on all screen sizes with functioning CTA buttons and animated statistics
About and services sections’ animations and modals open/close with accurate content and correct service pricing
Gallery loads images from API with responsive grid, hover effects, Instagram links, and lazy loading working
Reviews carousel cycles automatically and manually, displaying unique avatars and star ratings correctly
Booking form enforces required fields, date/time constraints (no Sundays, limited hours), and opens correctly formatted WhatsApp message; form resets on submission
Contact section’s clickable phone/email links and embedded map function as expected and are responsive
FAQ accordion expands/collapses properly with smooth animations and supports keyboard navigation
Footer links, social media icons, and policy modals open and work on all devices
Cookie banner appears on first visit, allows toggling optional cookies, and respects persistence flags preventing repeat display
Performance metrics meet criteria with fast load times, image optimizations, and smooth animations
Accessibility features such as keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, focus indicators, and reduced motion support conform to WCAG 2.1 AA standards
